Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Needle
Description: This is a needle with a point which, though oxidised,  appears to be intact. At the other extremity, the shaft has been slightly flattened. The object appears to be broken at this end; it is possible that this was the beginning of the hole of the eye of this needle.
